Events that occurred on 18 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 92.
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 122.
1955 - The sixth and final episode of 1955 radio series of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jonathan Hepworth.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 282.
1977 - Actor Cyril Ritchard dies.
2002 – The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released in United States of America.
2007 - MGM and New Line Cinema announce the development of The Hobbit (film series).

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring is formed.
Last quarter[1]
